description:
No one likes a sore butt. These bib liner shorts feature a premium chamois to add extra comfort in the saddle. Super stretchy and hell-yeah comfy, just throw on your favourite riding shorts, and go.

  • High waist with smooth bib design reduces slippage during your ride
  • Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility
  • Formula chamois improves comfort in the saddle
  • Poron® foam technology provides excellent vibration dampening
  • Flat stitching reduces chaffing
  • Base layer fit
name: Sombrio Crank Bib Liner Shorts - Men's
